articles.title: Scientists discover worrying phenomenon after drilling into glaciers: 'We need to be prepared'
articles.description: Scientists in the Swiss Alps have uncovered alarming developments regarding glacier disappearance, with glaciers melting from the bottom as well as the top, posing significant future implications.

articles.title: Iran fires missiles toward US military bases in Qatar and Iraq
articles.description: In retaliation for U.S. strikes on nuclear sites, Iran has launched missiles targeting U.S. military bases in Qatar and Iraq, escalating tensions in the region.

articles.title: Voting age lowered to 16 in the UK
articles.description: Britain has proposed lowering the voting age to 16 for all elections, aiming to boost voter participation and standardize voting rights across the UK.
